A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredible. So fresh\, so original\, and so unexpected. It constantly pushes the boundaries of what a Star Wars movie can say\, can be\, and subverts what most people expect from it. This is probably why some people are whining about it\, because its so new and different! Don’t listen to the haters\, they also complained about The Force Awakens for being “too similar” to earlier films\, so they just want something to complain about. Go see it! It’ll blow your mind!
